name: Galbia Tales
storyline:
In the middle of a stormy night a hooded figure silently approached a humble little house, in a cold village of Galbia kingdom.

She spied from the window and, after making sure all lights were off, she sneaked inside...

At dawn the brave swordsman of the kingdom realized that he had lost the only reason that kept him alive: his daughter.

He quickly took his sword and began the girl’s search all over the kingdom. He knew in his heart that if he wanted to find her he wouldn’t have to waste time.

So he began to run...
summary: Galbia Tales is a spin off of "La Leggenda Dell'Ultimo Drago" game. It is a frenetic runner game full of action and exploration. Follow the brave swordsman of Galbia kingdom to the search of the missing daughter in 15 different game levels, you'll know a world full of mysteries and magic. Fight hordes of monsters, demons and find the right way to defeat seemingly invincible creatures. Collect coins and gems to get powerful equipment. Don't forget, the time will be your biggest enemy.
